root.name: Math operations
root.description: Execute some simple math operations on sequences, such as addition, product, absolute value extraction, rounding to the closest integer, etc. All the operations are executed pointwise.
root.author: ylemontag - Yoann Le Montagner
root.changelog:
- Version 2.0.2.1 Date 2016-02-12 14:13:11
Re-uploaded (proper) jar file
- Version 2.0.2.0 Date 2016-02-11 17:22:42
Fixed an issue with the "expression" block not producing any output
- Version 2.0.1.0 Date 2013-04-22 13:42:06
Add: Operation1.COPY
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2013-04-16 10:29:04
Major code refactoring, add sub-sequences.
- Version 1.2.1.0 Date 2012-12-12 10:20:06
Fix: Variant.IllegalNullValue devient RuntimeException
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2012-12-10 14:51:56
Clarify the system of exceptions used by the plugin (the 'InvalidOperation' exception does not exist anymore)
- Version 1.1.5.0 Date 2012-10-17 13:17:36
Fix: missing .java sources in the .jar file.
- Version 1.1.4.0 Date 2012-09-28 22:51:19
Fix: wrong output object of math operation blocks when the output type is a scalar.
- Version 1.1.3.0 Date 2012-09-14 16:17:43
Fix: Support functors with 0 input argument (useful in MathOperations++).
- Version 1.1.2.0 Date 2012-09-06 11:46:47
Fix: save/load XML for VarOperation objects (only used in the EzPlug)
- Version 1.1.1.0 Date 2012-08-30 17:12:20
Fix: minor compatiblity issues with Math operations++
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2012-08-16 14:15:07
Fix: improve the naming of the result sequences (remove useless .0 and add () around negative scalars) Add: support for the upcoming Math operations++ plugin
- Version 1.0.4.0 Date 2012-08-03 15:25:53
Fix: VarEditor becomes SwingVarEditor, remove the FunctorUnary and FunctorBinary classes (the number of arguments of the 'apply' functions is now checked at runtime within the Functor class).
- Version 1.0.3.0 Date 2012-07-10 13:16:08
Fix: accept native datatypes as scalar input values in blocks
- Version 1.0.2.0 Date 2012-07-10 11:38:50
Fix: begin/endUpdate when allocating a sequence
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2012-07-02 16:25:25
Fix: Affect a default value to the output of MathOperation blocks when defining the output type.
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-06-28 17:34:36
Add: enable operations on arrays within the blocks
- Version 0.99.1.0 Date 2012-06-26 13:00:16
Fix: use VarArrayNative instead of VarArray
- Version 0.99.0.0 Date 2012-06-22 17:34:27
Add: support array inputs, except in blocks for the moment due VarMutable and arrays issues
- Version 0.0.2.0b Date 2012-06-22 16:33:43
Add: support 1D arrays
- Version 0.0.1.0b Date 2012-06-22 13:39:09
